f690cf14643757b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://87b3541437c8c443ccd36795e56a338ed12855eec17f8da624511b8d1a7e14df","dweb:/ipfs/QmeJQCtZrQjtJLr6u7ZHWeH3pBnjtLWzvRrKViAi7UZqxL"]},"src/core/BusinessRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2b841148d0af027458c67f7639ab8e9fa0e7950809d19b8f10975deee6154028","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fac33bc664f335b8ddcfed42c8f1e753f324f9280d333951add1de6c3cd52fcb","dweb:/ipfs/QmR3k1n7RbfufG5GAw4xsFg3VCAAHpsac13wXPkF1NSkam"]}},"version":1}

returns._0: businessId The business ID (0 if not found)

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params.onTime: Whether the repayment was on time

returns._0: businessId The ID of the newly registered business

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

addAuthorizedSigner(uint256,address).notice: Adds an authorized signer to a business

canSubmitInvoices(uint256).notice: Checks if a business can submit invoices

getBusinessByOwner(address).notice: Gets business ID by owner address

isAuthorizedSigner(uint256,address).notice: Checks if an address is an authorized signer

isBusinessActive(uint256).notice: Checks if a business is active

isBusinessVerified(uint256).notice: Checks if a business is verified

recordInvoiceFunded(uint256,uint256).notice: Records that an invoice was funded

recordInvoiceSubmitted(uint256).notice: Records that an invoice was submitted

removeAuthorizedSigner(uint256,address).notice: Removes an authorized signer from a business

updateCreditScore(uint256,uint256).notice: Updates the credit score of a business

verifyBusiness(uint256,bytes32,uint256).notice: Verifies a business with ZK proof
